name: Project Ambition (2021)
description:
A functional 3rd Person Shooter multiplayer prototype developed in Unreal Engine 4.27 by Kevin J. Gutiérrez Fuentes (Fleiwerks), José Javier Ortiz Vega and Kevyn Arroyo Colón (im_GAMMA-) for a college assignment.

Cover Photo made by Fleiwerk's Planet Generator
